data.text:
2024-25 Swimming & Diving Roster

Choose a Player:

Josh Seidman

Class Sophomore

Position Backstroke/Free

Hometown Voorhees, New Jersey

Highschool Eastern Regional High School

Bio

Related

Historical

Biography

PERSONAL BESTS 50 Free (21.24) 500 Free (4:39.55) 100 Back (50.50) 200 Back (1:49.16)

CAREER HONORS AND AWARDS ACADEMIC HONORS BIG EAST All-Academic Team (2023-24) Athletic Director's Honor Roll (Fall 2023, Spring 2024)

Villanova Career: Finished his debut season as the seventh-fastest performer in program history in the 200 Back at 1:49.18.

2023-24: Posted season bests in the 50 Free (21.81), 500 Free (4:41.24), 100 Back (50.50) and 200 Back (1:49.18); BIG EAST Championships (2/28-3/2): Point scorer for the ‘Cats in two events … Made the Championship final in the 200 Back, finishing fourth in 1:49.18 to become the seventh-fastest Wildcat in the event in team history … Had a personal best time of 50.50 in the 100 Back, finishing 11th; Providence (1/13): Touched third in the 200 SC Back in 2:09.90; La Salle (11/4): Finished second in both the 100 Back (52.35) and 200 Back (1:54.98); NJIT (11/3): Logged his first top-three finish with a third-place showing in the 200 Back (1:54.76) and swam a 47.64 anchor leg in the A team’s 400 Free Relay second-place finish.

Club Swimming: 2022 Scholastic All-America… Junior National Qualifier.

Eastern Regional High School: One varsity letter in swimming… Four-year Varsity swimming MVP… 2023 South Jersey Swimming Scholar Athlete of the Year… 7 High School Records… State Runner-Up… Swimming Excellence Award… Four-year Honor Roll member… 2020 Distinguished Honor Roll.

Personal: Born 8/15/2004 in Voorhees, NJ. … Son of Wendy and Jay Seidman… Has two siblings, Eve and Sara… Sara Seidman swam at Rowan College (2012-2016)… Chose to attend Villanova because of its combination of great academics and outstanding athletics. I wanted to be a part of a close-knit team culture and positive atmosphere…Declared major in economics.
